import React from "react"; function Skills() { const skills = [ { name: "HTML", logo: "/logos/html.svg" }, { name: "CSS", logo: "/logos/css.svg" }, { name: "Bootstrap", logo: "/logos/boostrap.svg" }, { name: "Tailwind CSS", logo: "/logos/tailwind.svg" }, { name: "JavaScript", logo: "/logos/javascript.svg" }, { name: "Python", logo: "/logos/python.svg" }, { name: "Django", logo: "/logos/django.svg" }, { name: "Flask", logo: "/logos/flask.svg" }, { name: "ReactJS", logo: "/logos/react.svg" }, { name: "Framer Motion", logo: "/logos/framer.svg" }, { name: "MySQL", logo: "/logos/mysql.svg" }, { name: "Npm", logo: "/logos/npm.svg" }, { name: "Git", logo: "/logos/git.svg" }, { name: "GitHub", logo: "/logos/github.svg" }, { name: "Vercel", logo: "/logos/vercel.svg" }, { name: "Postman", logo: "/logos/postman.svg" }, { name: "Linux", logo: "/logos/linux.svg" }, { name: "C", logo: "/logos/c.svg" }, ]; return (

Skills & Technologies

{skills.map((skill) => (
{skill.name}
))}
); } export default Skills;
